code: import React from'react';import{AppBar,Toolbar,Typography,Container,Select,MenuItem,createTheme,ThemeProvider}from'@mui/material';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{CryptoState}from'../CryptoContext';import btc from"../assets/biticon.png";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const history=useNavigate();const{currency,setCurrency}=CryptoState();console.log(currency);const darkTheme=createTheme({palette:{primary:{main:"#040D12"},type:"dark"}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ThemeProvider,{theme:darkTheme,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppBar,{color:"transparent",position:"static",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Toolbar,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{onClick:()=>history('/'),sx:{flex:1,color:'gold',fontFamily:'Montserrat',fontWeight:'bold',cursor:'pointer',varient:"h6"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:btc,alt:"h1",sx:{marginTop:"30px"}})," Crypto Mars"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Select,{variant:"outlined",style:{width:100,height:80,marginLeft:15,color:"white"},value:currency,onChange:e=>setCurrency(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{value:'USD',children:"USD"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{value:'INR',children:"INR"})]})]})})})});};export default Header;
